name: amalgamation beanie
notes: > [get email updates][1] to hear about shaina’s new designs, video tutorials, class schedule, and receive subscriber-only introductory discounts on pattern releases! the amalgamation beanie is knit with two strands of worsted weight yarn held together, creating a thick, warm hat that’s perfect for chilly days. made from scrap cakes, each version becomes a unique amalgamation of colors, making it a true one-of-a-kind stash-busting project. the pattern is provided in two variations – knit flat and seamed or knit seamlessly in the round. work according to preference. **skills required:** cast on knit/purl k2tog/p2tog seaming (optional) working in the round (optional) **sizes:** one size. due to the stretchy nature of both garter stitch and doubled yarn, this hat will fit most adult heads. **finished measurements**: 19”/48 cm brim circumference & 10”/25 cm depth from crown to lower edge. **gauge**: 12 stitches and 22 rows = 4”/10 cm in garter stitch holding two strands of worsted weight yarn together using size needle to obtain gauge. **needles**: us 11 (8 mm) knitting needle or size needed for gauge for hat knit flat. us 11 (8 mm) 16”/40 cm circular needles and us 11 (8 mm) double pointed needles for hat knit in the round. adjust needle size as necessary to obtain the correct gauge.  **yarn:** approximately 220 yards total of worsted weight (cyca #4) yarn. the yarn will be held double strand for the hat, and the yardage amount listed accounts for that. “scrap cakes” of various colors and fibers of worsted weight yarns were used in the sample hat. **other materials:** stitch marker, tapestry needle. the amalgamation beanie is a perfect project for beginners looking to dive into knitting. this adult-sized beanie is worked in the round, featuring a fitted design with stripes for a pop of color. the seamless construction and bottom-up approach make it a quick and enjoyable knit. **unique features-** • beginner-friendly pattern for new knitters • seamless construction for a polished finish • fitted design for a comfortable and stylish fit • stripes/colorwork add visual interest to the beanie **materials needed-** • needle: 8mm (us size 11.0) • yarn: a wondrous worsted (worsted weight, 200-220 yards) • gauge: 12 stitches by 22 row = 10 centimeters in garter stitch [1]: https://www.shainabilow.com/mailing-list
